section.p: You try to fight, but it has become so cold that you can hardly breathe. Your eyelids freeze together, and you cannot see. Suddenly, you are struck senseless.

You come round on the shore of the lake, but you have drained of your vital energy by some vampiric force. Reduce your Rank by one, and roll a die. The result is the
number of Stamina points you lose , permanently.
